https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kN8C9K9bSQ01lItuEqYzROYErAX.jpg Arn, the son of a high-ranking Swedish nobleman is educated in a monastery and sent to the Holy Land as a knight templar to do penance for a forbidden love. Arn: The Knight Templar
